sense.gloss: katsuobushi, small pieces of sliced dried bonito
skipjack tuna (Katsuwonus pelamis), oceanic bonito, victorfish
butterfish (any fish of family Stromateidae, esp. species Pampus punctatissimus), harvestfish, rudderfish
log on the roof of a shrine set perpendicular to the ridgepole
temptation one can't resist, setting a wolf to mind the sheep, trusting a cat with milk
the first bonito of the season

sdata.j: ↑江戸↑↓えど↓っ↑子↑↓こ↓にとって、↑初鰹↑↓はつがつお↓は↑借金↑↓しゃっきん↓しても↑食↑↓た↓べるべきものだった。
sdata.e: For the residents of Edo, the first bonito of the year was something that had to be bought, even if it meant borrowing money.

words.gloss: katsuobushi, small pieces of sliced dried bonito
skipjack tuna (Katsuwonus pelamis), oceanic bonito, victorfish
butterfish (any fish of family Stromateidae, esp. species Pampus punctatissimus), harvestfish, rudderfish
